entries.title: LG’s META tech for OLED TVs is much better than the terrible name implies

entries.title: The JBL Bar 1300X is like a full surround sound system, but in a soundbar

entries.title: The Razer Kiyo Pro Ultra is an enormous webcam that keeps you looking great
entries.description: This thing is the size of a DSLR lens, but the results are undeniable.

entries.title: The Naya Create is a modular keyboard system for folks who want total control
entries.description: Ergonomics reach geeky levels of control with the Naya Create.

entries.title: Would you buy an Afeela, the car made by Sony and Honda?
